definition: to fix/to settle/a libation to the dead
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to offer sacrifices (to one's ancestors)/to hold or attend a memorial service
pouring of wine on ground for sacrifice
a gift of money to the family of the deceased
to determine the position of the capital/to found a capital

sentences.english: Pluralism of knowledge is based on this foundation.
sentences.chinese: 知識的多元論就是奠基於這個基礎上的。

sentences.english: Another science that received its foundation in Greek times is geography .
sentences.chinese: 另一門奠基於希臘時代的科學是地理。

sentences.english: France surrendered after the fall of Diên Biên Phu in 1954.
sentences.chinese: 1954年在奠邊府戰役中失利後法國最終投降。

sentences.english: Furthermore, scaffolded assistance proved to be essential to the regulatory progression.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，調節階段的進步奠基於應架式協助。

sentences.english: Dien Bien Phu saw one of the most bizarre happenings in modern warfare.
sentences.chinese: 奠邊府戰役中，發生了些現代戰場上罕見的怪事。

sentences.english: Mingmen doctrine is founded on the "difficult by the" mature in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 命門學說奠基於《難經》，發展成熟於明代。

sentences.english: For just under two months Dien Bien Phu was cut off.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅兩個月，奠邊府被團團圍住。

sentences.english: The collateral and collateral disease theory is based on The Canon of Internal Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 絡脈與絡病學說奠基於《黃帝內經》。

sentences.english: What happened at Dien Bien Phu in 1954?
Roger's Breakfast Club features great food, good friends and a libation or two.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑的早餐大特色食品，好朋友奠的一個或兩個。

sentences.english: Ikea's success is built on its innovative designs and low prices.
sentences.chinese: 宜室宜家的成功奠基於創新的設計和低廉的價格。

definition: I beg you to partake of this sacrifice (used at the end of an elegiac address)
a funeral/to encoffin a corpse/to carry to burial
to offer a sacrifice to (gods or ancestors)/memorial ceremony/(in classical novels) to recite an incantation to activate a magic weapon/(lit. and fig.) to wield
